definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: Temporary mount directory where sysadmins can mount filesystems.
sentences.chinese: 系統管理員臨時加載文件系統的地方。

sentences.english: Once the bootloader is loaded, press power to install.
sentences.chinese: 一旦引導加載，按權力來安裝。

sentences.english: Try reloading your page and checking it out.
sentences.chinese: 請您也嘗試重新加載您的頁面並查看結果。

sentences.english: Cannot load the style sheet due to a corrupt style sheet file.
sentences.chinese: 因樣式表文件已損壞而無法加載該樣式表。

sentences.english: The creep of concrete with different load ages.
sentences.chinese: 不同加載齡期混凝土的徐變規律。

sentences.english: The field cache has therefore been modified such that it only reloads parts where the segment has changed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，修改後的字段緩存只會加載更新過的片斷。

sentences.english: This function loads a locally-defined class.
sentences.chinese: 這個函數加載一個本地定義的類。

sentences.english: All of the Add-Ons content is otherwise unmodified.
sentences.chinese: 所有的加載項內容是，否則未修改。

sentences.english: Loading was achieved through a battery of hydraulic jacks acting on a rigid metallic distribution plate .
sentences.chinese: 通過作用於剛性金屬墊板上的一組液壓千斤頂加載。

sentences.english: That extra couple of seconds of load-time may just be worth it.
sentences.chinese: 加載時間增加了幾秒，但更加安全了。

sentences.english: XNA: An easy way to use just one spritebatch?
sentences.chinese: 只使用一隻加載一個簡單的方法？

sentences.english: Option to not load avatar pictures in posts.
sentences.chinese: 選擇不加載職位頭像圖片。

sentences.english: When you add a message, the whole page reloads, for example, even though the system seems perfectly capable of adding incoming messages to the conversation without a reset.
sentences.chinese: 當你添加新消息時，整個頁面都會重新加載。

sentences.english: By means of the formula, mixed-mode fatigue thresholds of the material can be calculated.
sentences.chinese: 依此式可以估算各種複合比加載條件下的疲勞門檻限。

sentences.english: One is to load all referenced schemas.
sentences.chinese: 一個步驟是加載所有引用的模式。

sentences.english: Load in the disaster site recovery scripts or procedures for the configuration replication volume.
sentences.chinese: 爲配置複製卷加載災難站點恢復腳本或過程。

definition: to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
barrage (military)/"bullet screen", function which allows viewers to post on-screen comments in videos, movies etc in real time/danmaku (video game subgenre)
question bank (for examiners creating an exam, or students preparing for an exam)
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
